title: Please help identify font that has font arm and apex below center
content:
I hate coming into a site after someone else. I have no idea what this font is. I would love help. Thanks.  
Darren

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828222732im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font2_6399.jpg)
author: Texholywd

comments.content:
Wow, I have never even heard of this font. Thanks.  
D
Sing along, and you'll never forget it again: [An Ode on a Typeface](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828222732/http:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=xHCu28bfxSI)
